wikipedia_page.main: Neil Lowe (born (1978-12-20)20 December 1978) is a former Scotland international rugby league footballer who played in the 1990s, 2000s and 2010s. He played at club level for Featherstone Rovers (Heritage No.), Salford, Doncaster, York City Knights, Keighley Cougars and the Hunslet Hawks, as a second-row.

response: * Neil Lowe won caps for Scotland while at Featherstone Rovers, Doncaster, York and Keighley 1999...present 3-caps + 4-caps (sub)
* Neil Lowe won caps for Scotland Featherstone Rovers, Doncaster, York, and Keighley 1999...present 3-caps + 4-caps (sub)

response: :I'm pretty sure National Leagues no longer contribute representative players - The lesser national teams such as Wales and Scotland do draw from the lower leagues, such as Wales from Celtic Crusaders (Gareth Dean, Anthony Blackwood and Neil Lowe are examples).
